org.opends.server.admin.std.client

Interface TrustManagerProviderCfgClient

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ConfigurationClient
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    BlindTrustManagerProviderCfgClient, FileBasedTrustManagerProviderCfgClient

    public interface TrustManagerProviderCfgClient
extends ConfigurationClient
    A client-side interface for reading and modifying Trust Manager Provider settings.

    Trust Manager Providers determine whether to trust presented certificates.
